LanguageData.AteBloodrito.stages.ate_bloodrito.label: ate bloodrito
LanguageData.AteBloodrito.stages.ate_bloodrito.descri: Had a bloodrito. Tasted funky, but a good funky.
LanguageData.AteBloodSausage.stages.ate_blood_sausage: Had a blood sausage. It was okay.
LanguageData.AteBugCream.stages.ate_bug_cream.label: ate bug cream
LanguageData.AteBugCream.stages.ate_bug_cream.descrip: Had to force myself to eat bug cream. I shouldn't be eating this.
LanguageData.AteMysteryLoaf.stages.ate_mystery_meatlo: I have no idea what is in this, but holy Lord is it great!
